front.title: A Framework for Intra-ITAD Communications Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes a framework for the intra-Internet TelephonyAdministrative Domain (Intra-ITAD) communications protocol. Theintra-ITAD communications scenarios are analyzed. The requirementshow the protocol will provide alias addresses resolution for routinga call to the appropriate gateway are described along with otherattributes like capacity and QoS.
